summary:
The Security Council, 
Recalling previous resolutions and statements on Yemen, including resolution 2691 (2023), 
Reaffirming commitment to Yemen's unity, sovereignty, independence, and territorial integrity, 
Endorsing the Hodeidah Agreement, 

1. Extends until 14 July 2025 the mandate of UNMHA to support the implementation of the Agreement on the City of Hodeidah and Ports of Hodeidah, Salif, and Ras Issa.

2. Requests the Secretary-General to report monthly on progress regarding the implementation of this resolution.

3. Requests the Secretary-General to present a review of UNMHA at least one month before its mandate expires.

4. Intends to review UNMHA's mandate and make adjustments as necessary, considering developments on the ground, including a durable nationwide ceasefire.

5. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
